alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Franklin; Union (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 7:25PM EDT until June 25 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR EASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA...SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTY IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA...NORTH CENTRAL DEARBORN COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA...SOUTHWESTERN PREBLE COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AND WESTERN BUTLER COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN OHIO... At 725 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brookville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Oxford, Brookville, West College Corner, Darrtown, Reily, Millville, St. Leon, Scipio, College Corner, Cedar Grove, Mount Carmel, Mounds State Recreation Area, Cottage Grove, Rockdale, Mcgonigle, Sharptown, Layhigh, Charlottesville and Hueston Woods State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern and east central Indiana...and southwestern and west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
